column5: I haven't been out fishing a lot this summer, but I had the good fortune of getting out both days this past weekend!  Saturday was spent with GBW and we had a great time out there.  Yesterday, Fishnsled and I hit the Kawarthas in search of some fish!  It was just my third time out this season.  We were on the water at just after 7am.  Within the first half and hour, we both had muskies on and unfortunately we both lost them.  They were rolling around the surface and we were hoping for a banner day!  Will spoke up "It's great being on the water at this time...it's quiet...there's no boat traffic...and the fish seem to be on!".  About a second later, the first group of 3 bass boats screamed by us...followed closely by 2 more.   LOL.  Apparently there was a tournament on the lake!!!  The bite instantly turned off as soon as they zoomed on by, so we changed our focus to bass.  We boated about 10 fish all day long....nothing huge...not a banner day, but a great day nonetheless.  Here's a few pics.          Thanks Will!  For the great day on the water and a great dinner later in the day.  Now...we'll focus on Nipissing...and then lets pick a date or two for those fall muskie!!!!
Looks like both days were good for you.  Nice fish too.
Nice Bass & Great report hopefully you get the Musky next time, darn bass boats LOL Thanx for posting Richard
Looks like you had a great time out there Cliff Thanks for taking the time to post and share with us!!! Leechman
Great Day and Great Pics.  Thanks for sharing!
Man it's good to see a report from you bud.  Was just talking with Jason 10 mins ago. He was looking for your phone number....something about fishing a back lake for big bass.
Hey Cliff,  It certainly was a good day on the water, nice to get you out again.  Thanks for putting up the report and we'll definitely plan something for the fall.  Can't wait for Nippissing!  Will
Sounds like a nice day spent with a fellow OFC'er. Some decent fish caught and some good times had. Thanks for sharing.
Hey Cliff....nice fish.  I sent you a message on OFC....lost your #....give me a shout  Cheers  Jason
